snippet: Joshua and Sharyn Hakken were arrested in Florida, and their children returned to their grandparents, after rare cooperation between hostile countries.
abstract: Joshua and Sharyn Hakken, Florida couple accused of kidnapping their two young boys after losing custody and then fleeing to Cuba, are brought back to United States and arrested in Tampa; children are returned to grandparents after rare cooperation between two hostile countries.
lead_paragraph: Joshua and Sharyn Hakken were arrested in Florida, and their children returned to their grandparents, after rare cooperation between hostile countries.

headline.seo: Cuba Returns Couple Who Fled Florida in Custody Fight
headline.main: Cuba Returns Couple Who Fled With Sons in Custody Fight
headline.print_headline: Cuba Returns Couple Who Fled With Sons in Custody Fight
